name: pleasantness
content:

the quality of being enjoyable, attractive, friendly, or easy to like: She recalled the pleasantness of the evening. Her pleasantness was usually followed by a request for money. See
pleasant
More examplesFewer examplesHe saw her pleasantness and her basic goodness early on.The whole house had acquired a new pleasantness and comfort. There is essential pleasantness in reading the writing of men who are not angry, who can disagree without quarreling.
